entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:51 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
